attributes.action: put a gagging order on Robert Peston
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that every time he opens his mouth about the economy the FTSE goes through the floor. Please ban him from saying bad things about the economy as it's getting a bit boring now.

rejection.details: Complaints about BBC reporters should be addressed to the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
